projects.name: CAFEIN-FL

highlights: Partners: CERN, CNR, Politecnico di Milano, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens.

projects.name: IoT Group Project
projects.summary: Designing and implementing a software prototype for a social distancing application using TinyOS and Node-Red, tested with Cooja. The application is meant to alert users when two people (motes) are close to each other.

projects.summary: Building an application able to react to the failure of a switch (node) using OpenFlow switches and Ryu as a network controller. Implemented both reactive and proactive failure handling methods.
